import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """The new algorithm calculates the scores for the bins by taking the exponential of the negative difference between the remaining capacity of each bin and the item size, subtracts the minimum value across all bins from the obtained scores, adds the maximum value across all bins to the scores, and finally normalizes the scores by dividing them by the maximum score."""

    # Calculate the difference between the remaining capacity of each bin and the item size
    difference = bins - item

    # Take the negative exponential of the difference
    scores = np.exp(-difference)

    # Subtract the minimum value across all bins from the scores
    scores -= np.min(scores)

    # Add the maximum value across all bins to the scores
    scores += np.max(scores)

    # Normalize the scores by dividing them by the maximum score
    scores /= np.max(scores)

    return scores
